reviewText: SOME GOOD MOVIES HERE. I BOUGHT USED, MY ONLY COMPLAINT WAS THE DISC HAS A FLAW RIGHT AT THE END OF EVIL KNIVEL AND IT FREEZES THERE
arrived on time.  product exactly as described.  very satisfied.
Great Service and high quality video !

Extras on the BAD TO THE BONE 4 Movie Pack include bios of Joe Namath, George Hamilton and Gary Busey. This collection has a motorcyle/action theme. SYNOPSES: ANGELS HARD AS THEY COME-- Two gangs meet in the desert to conclude a drug deal. A girl is killed and the gangs turn on each other. Co-written by action film director Jonathan Demme and distributed by Roger Corman's New World Pictures. C.C. AND COMPANY-- Motorcycle mechanic joins an outlaw biker gang but refuses to participate in the mayhem they create. EVEL KNIEVEL-- Shows Knievel's metamorphosis from small town lawbreaker to stunt motorcyclist. A desire to continuously top himself often left this daredevil in traction with multiple bone fractures. STEAL WHEELS-- Biker tracks his wife's killer through Florida's rural backroads. The manhunt comes to a shocking climax. WILD RIDES 4 Movie Pack (also from BCI / Eclipse) is another built-for-speed collection. BRENTWOOD's 4-fers are nicely priced movie bundles. Video and sound quality of these digitally unrestored public domain films is generally fine. Discs are dual-side recorded. . Parenthetical numbers preceding titles are 1 to 10 viewer poll ratings found at a film resource website. (4.4) Angels Hard as They Come (1971) - Scott Glenn/Gary Busey/Charles Dierkop (3.6) C.C. and Company (1970) - Joe Namath/Ann-Margret/William Smith/Jennifer Billingsley (4.8) Evil Knievel (1971) - George Hamilton/Sue Lyon/Rod Cameron/Dub Taylor (???) Steal Wheels (2000) - Gregg Giacobbe/Rodger Loper/Tim Stone/James Burkey/Lisa Smith
